    • Constructor Detail

      • ShrinkingPlayerLaunchedBullet

        public ShrinkingPlayerLaunchedBullet(float velocity,
                             BulletShape shape,
                             java.lang.String c,
                             int damage,
                             float decay,
                             boolean lockAngle,
                             boolean offScreenDelete,
                             boolean spinning)
        Instantiates this bullet
        Parameters:
        velocity - Speed of the bullet
        shape - BulletShape to use for the Bullet
        c - Color of the bullet
        damage - Damage the bullet deals
        decay - How much this bullet decays by every timestep
        lockAngle - determines whether or not to calculate the angle the bullet is moving in for sprite animations
        offScreenDelete - determines whether or not to delete this bullet once offscreen
        spinning - whether to attach an angular velocity to this bullet

      • ShrinkingPlayerLaunchedBullet

        public ShrinkingPlayerLaunchedBullet(float velocity,
                             java.awt.Dimension hitbox,

                             int damage,
                             float decay,

                             boolean offScreenDelete,
                             boolean spinning)
        Instantiates this bullet
        Parameters:
        velocity - Speed of the bullet
        hitbox - hitbox size
        sprite - Sprite Texture to use
        spriteSize - Sprite size
        damage - Damage the bullet deals
        decay - How much this bullet decays by every timestep
        lockAngle - determines whether or not to calculate the angle the bullet is moving in for sprite animations
        offScreenDelete - determines whether or not to delete this bullet once offscreen
        spinning - whether to attach an angular velocity to this bullet
